request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /User_customization

**Description**: Returns ListUsers

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/user-customization/users

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/user-customization/users' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "9",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 100,
            "value": "SuperUser",
            "name": "SuperUser",
            "description": "Super User with Access to all levels"
        },
        {
            "id": 0,
            "value": "System",
            "name": "System",
            "description": "** Do not change **"
        },
        {
            "id": 50004,
            "value": "50000",
            "name": "Contact of Joe Block",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 104,
            "value": "",
            "name": "Carl Boss",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 105,
            "value": "",
            "name": "Henry Seed",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50001,
            "value": "WebService",
            "name": "WebService",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 103,
            "value": "joesales",
            "name": "Joe Sales",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 101,
            "value": "gardenadmin@adempiere.io",
            "name": "GardenAdmin",
            "description": "GardenAdmin"
        },
        {
            "id": 102,
            "value": "gardenuser@adempiere.io",
            "name": "GardenUser",
            "description": "GardenUser"
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /user-customization

**Description**: Returns ListRoles

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/user-customization/roles

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/user-customization/roles' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "5",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 0,
            "value": "",
            "name": "System Administrator",
            "description": "System Administrator Role (cannot be changed)"
        },

            "description": ""
        },
        {

        },
        {
            "id": 103,
            "value": "",

            "description": "GardenWorld User"
        },
        {
            "id": 50004,
            "value": "",
            "name": "Web Service Execution",
            "description": ""
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

response.name: ListRoles

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /user-customization

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/user-customization/windows/{tab_id}/{level_type}/{level_value}

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params)**

tab_id (int32, Mandatory)

level_type (int32, Mandatory)

level_value (int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request POST 'http://api.adempiere.io/user-customization/windows/394/1/102' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the level value does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Usuario * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}
 ```

- the level type does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Nivel SaaS * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the tab id does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Pestaña * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /user-customization

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/user-customization/browsers/{browse_id}/{level_type}/{level_value}

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params)**

browse_id (int32, Mandatory)

level_type (int32, Mandatory)

level_value (int32, Mandatory)

**Parameters (Body)**

field_attributes (JSON, Optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/user-customization/browsers/50110/1/100' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU' \
--data '{
    "field_attributes":{}
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the level value does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Usuario * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the level type does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Nivel SaaS * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the browse id does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Smart Browse * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /user-customization
